title: Found in a Dream
overview: Set in Australia and Ethiopia, this film explores the journey of a young adopted Ethiopian-Australian man struggling to find his path. Abeselom is a drug dealer living in Melbourne. Experiencing isolation and navigating between doing what is right and doing what he must to survive, Abeselom's world is changed when he meets a young nurse named Netsanet. The film is about love, culture and, ultimately, finding comfort within connection.

title: Blind ermittelt: Das Haus der Lügen
overview: The director of an elite boarding school is set on fire in his own bed and dies. Haller investigates covertly as the new music teacher.

title: The Darkest Nothing: Paraphrenia
overview: Addicted to violent disturbing images and videos on the Dark Web, Judy is in desperate need of help. Her psychiatrist William tries a unique method on Judy that takes her deep inside her most brutal fantasies, she participates in everything she thought it was just creepy pasta, until she realizes that William does something else with her.
tagline: The Human Mind is darker than the Deep Web.

title: Homie Kei - The Japanese Gangster Who Became Chicano
overview: A Japanese former gangster recounts how his life changed after forging an unlikely kinship with Chicano gang members while serving time in the U.S. prison system.

title: The Crooked Mind
overview: Kyle Carson is diagnosed with multiple personality disorder, also known as DID. He despises his community after doing a background search on everyone who he believes has committed a crime without punishment. When one of his multiple personalities, Jonah, comes forth; he trains Kyle to kill and not be seen. Detective Amon Barracks leads the charge

title: Debal: Uncrowned Underdogs
overview: Set in the 1960's, DEBAL: a story of Pakistan's most wanted gangsters and the leaders of the drug cartel.

title: Life After Life
overview: After decades behind bars, three men set out to prove success can lie on the other side of tragedy. Follows the stories of Harrison, Noel, and Chris as they return home from San Quentin State Prison. After spending most of their lives incarcerated, they are forced to reconcile their perception of themselves with a reality they are unprepared for. Each struggles to overcome personal demons and reconstruct their fractured lives. Grappling with day-to-day challenges and striving for success, they work to reconnect with family and provide for themselves for the first time in their adult lives. Told in an unadorned vérité style, we experience the truth of their heartaches and triumphs. As their stories unfold over weeks, months and years, the precarious nature of freedom after incarceration in America is revealed.
tagline: Personal Stories of Adjusting to Life After Incarceration

title: You, me and a corpse between
overview: Run away from the all night through party, a young girl is trying to help her good friend to get rid of the bloody consequences of the quarrel with his wife. By the way they reveal new circumstances of their relationship.

title: Mr, Motta
overview: Dexter Motta is an up and coming filmmaker who has been under scrutiny since his last film, which inadvertently brought heat down on one of the city's most notorious figures. With his career on the line , he takes on his grittiest and most dangerous subject yet. A sit-down interview with a hired gun looking to retire.
tagline: Know Your Target

title: Kalispell
overview: Circa 1973, a teenage girl has a run in with her state’s serial killer... the Kalispell killer...

title: Frederick
overview: How far would you go for your art?
tagline: How far would you go for your art?

title: Cypher
overview: The Cyphers are a mysterious order of vigilantes.

title: Wohimo
overview: March is Women's History Month! Get the girls together for giggles, gossip, and a little bit of gore—because during Wohimo, everybody bleeds ;)

title: Ultraviolet
overview: In Vancouver, British Columbia, two teenagers attempt to create a feature length documentary about their lives. The main character James (played by himself) becomes obsessed with the project and is pushed into a more introverted, lonely existence.  His best friend Quinn (played by himself) sets out to help him, but is met with the real answer as to why James is keeping himself inside: the rejection of what he thinks is the love of his life.  The two of them go their separate ways, with James going deeper into a depression he’s not sure he can escape from.
tagline: Two teenagers set out to make a film about their lives, but their emotional problems take over.

title: The Veiled
overview: As a daughter grinds away as caretaker for her father she discovers some memories are best left hidden under the veil of dementia.
tagline: Some memories are best forgotten.

title: America
overview: Frederik's attempts at creating the safest place possible, where he is protected by his lovely walls in a room filled with guns. A story of uNRAveling.

title: Diamonds
overview: Three gangsters are forced to steal a diamond in exchange for their lives.

title: The Bastard Son
overview: A young man is going through a deep dilemma between killing his brother to keep his father's inheritance or leaving him alive, so he decides to meet a lawyer in a cafe to ask him for advice. The story is intertwined with an event in his family past, because when the boy decides to act, he is surprised by the consequences of an infidelity that occurred 25 years ago.
tagline: The sins of the father can destroy the son.

title: Rejectors
overview: A young outcast is recruited to join the Rejectors, an anti-fascist gang.

title: Parkour Chase (Swindon Edition)
overview: A man has his wallet stolen by an athletic thief in Swindon. A chase ensues.
tagline: It's the first film on our channel. We hope you enjoy!

title: Sad Dad
overview: A young boy (George Azar) is horrendously murdered and his father (Collin Huber) goes into mourning.
tagline: What did it cost?

title: Two Can Play That Game
overview: A frustrated shopkeeper's quick thinking helps him get the upper hand in battling a shoplifting epidemic.

title: Charlie Knox
overview: A prisoner is surprised to hear that his lawyer will no longer be helping him appeal his case when he meets Charlie Knox.

title: Nurse Kennedy
overview: Tom Rodgers is making his video diary entry for his Doctor Sherman about his experiences with his nosy neighbor Mrs. Kennedy, when he gets knocked back to reality in a disturbing turn of events.

title: Run
overview: To run away from your home, because your brother stole the money you collect to buy a camera. To let in your car the first person with trouble on the road, to kiss his girlfriend and to find a watch in your pocket, which was a reason for murder. To fall in love into a nice blond girl, who is searching for the killer of her mother. To be chased my a local thug who blows up your cheap car with old tires. To find out that instead of being a truck driver in Canada, your brother was in jail. To see the barrel of a gun, pointing at your forehead and your last scream to be "RUN".

title: Goodnight Moon
overview: Private Detective Marv Andrews takes on a missing person's case from a mysterious woman with ties the local mob, and gets far more than he bargained for.
tagline: Time to say Goodnight...

title: Paper Caper
overview: Three students at an elite high school plan to steal the school exam papers before examinations commence.

title: El Karma
overview: While living without a care, Daniel's ambition has separated him from his family. With time against him, now he must face the cruelest of lessons to recover what was once his.

title: unbeatin
overview: UNBEATiN' is a short film directed and shot by Mahi Dubey and stars Ashish Dubey and Ravi Jadhav. Ashish, as the protagonist, fights his way to his boss's office in order to get a job. Threatened by his boss that he'll Punish him dead if the protagonist cannot get to his office in five minutes, the protagonist kills many on his way to the office only to end up killing the boss and leaving the Training Department.
tagline: A Protagonist that has been trained to kill, Betrayed the Boss of that training Department and has only five minutes to prove his worth before the Boss cuts his Job - he fights his way to his boss' office in order to gain a job.

title: Amor Sacro
overview: Innocenzo is a 39 years old cistercenses monk, ceramist and singer for the abbey he lives in, but new obligations arise as the parson of the village is transfered. He finds himself face to face with the complexity of community life and starts to question his identity as a person and man of faith.

title: Toda la noche
overview: An argentinian couple in a party at the countryside find that their friends are being killed. However, it's hard to find the killer, because they are completely stoned and don't know what is real or not.

title: Stranger
overview: A short film that precedes Yung Lean's album "Stranger"
tagline: A fugitive turns into a demon then a sad clown and finally becomes a man again.

title: Murdered by My Fiancé
overview: Documentary about the killing of author Helen Bailey. When the renowned writer of children's books was reported missing, her fiancé Ian Stewart claimed that she had simply gone to her holiday home in Broadstairs to 'clear her head'. Later, he was charged with her murder when her body was discovered in a cesspit underneath their home.

title: Quitting Time!!
overview: A young amateur junkie is on the peak of his addiction on the same day his buddies plan an obscure robbery.
tagline: When it hits, it hits you quick... and surely is one hell of a trip.

title: Border Pursuit
overview: The film "Detecting Murderers at the Border" tells that Lao Jiang is a captain of the Interpol, because his busy work has created an emotional gap with his daughter. At the same time, an ordinary theft case involved three wanted criminals. Under the leadership of Lao Jiang, all the criminals were eventually captured. At the same time, Lao Jiang was injured. However, her daughter learned about the greatness of Lao Jiang and eventually reunited with Lao Jiang. .

title: Kanika
overview: A woman takes an evening stroll in suburban Mumbai, narrating the story of her elope. The end will move you.’ Watch Girliyapa’s first short film “Kanika” to know her story.

title: The Final Goodbye
overview: Set in 1961 Cleveland, a down-on-his-luck detective becomes entwined with two shadowy characters from his past and is drawn into a web of kidnappings, murder, and Nazi absconded artwork.

title: The Hobbyist
overview: A seemingly ordinary man seeks out a sagacious druggist in search of an undetectable poison, but winds up getting more than he bargained for.

title: Until Proven Innocent
overview: In October 2006 a four-year-old from Corpus Christi named Andrew Burd died mysteriously of salt poisoning. His foster mother, Hannah Overton, was charged with capital murder, vilified from all quarters, and sent to prison for life. But was this churchgoing young woman a vicious child killer? Or had the tragedy claimed its second victim?
tagline: The Hannah Overton Story

title: Blow a Kiss
overview: A woman down on her luck stumbles into a bar run by a local meth dealer and finds herself accepting an offer that will change her life for the worse.

title: Signature Work
overview: Believing that his model is in trouble, a retired engineer, now an amateur painter, hires a private detective to find her.

title: MacGuffin
overview: Kevin is down on his luck. Him and his wife, Alice, can no longer afford the expensive medication for their ill son, Logan. Without the knowledge of his wife, Kevin begins working for criminal mastermind, Scott. Kevin’s best friend, Jay, joins him and together they must finish one last job for Scott so that they could be rich for life. Unfortunately, the reward comes with a deadly price.
tagline: There are seven deadly sins. Greed is the deadliest.

title: Flat Hunt
overview: Stuck in a room with two hit-men, three students must keep their wits about them in order to survive the night.
tagline: If they knock, don't answer.

title: From One Pocket Into Another
overview: In the backdrop of 1995 East London, not all is as it seems as Frenchy persuades his eccentric gang to steal from The Stanfields, an impregnable family run drug ring.
tagline: It's all about the smash and grab.

title: Valley of the Dead
overview: After the events of Goodnight Moon, Mob boss Elliott Edwards sends a hitman to dispose of John Hartigan in order to keep things quiet. The Hitman, however, may have an agenda of his own accord.
tagline: No running. No hiding. Just buying time.

title: Last Pickup
overview: While in the employ of Mr. Worthington, James, Mickey and Whitey have made several successful and uneventful pickups, but one last pickup will prove to be an adventure and the difference between life as free men and life behind bars.
tagline: This was never the plan

title: Trap
overview: Veerappan-the forest brigand who is still revered by a section of people even after his death was a ruthless killer of hundreds of forest and police officers.

title: Perlacola's Collection
overview: Filming his latest pornographic film, director Atilio Peracola remembers his deceased actors throughout his 12-year career. To what extent is an actor willing to go for a good performance?

title: Deadly Legacy
overview: In 2011, Detective Sergeant Jason Moran from the Sheriff’s Department of Cook County Illinois, reopened the case of one of America’s most notorious serial killers, ‘The Killer Clown’ John Wayne Gacy. Although Gacy was convicted of 33 murders and killed by lethal injection in 1994, unbelievably, EIGHT of his victims remain unidentified.  Today, 40 years after the discovery of the crawlspace under Gacy’s Chicago home, where he buried most of his victims, Detective Moran knows time is running out to identify the remaining unnamed victims of this sadistic killer.

title: Born to Die
overview: After a conflicted teenager commits the unthinkable, he is forced to flee town.

title: The Night is Calling
overview: Luís is a humble wool salesman in the city of Vila Franca de Xira. He spends quietly his daily routine, until the night comes.

title: Night Shift
overview: Inspired by a true story, this short takes you an a thrilling journey of family, faith, and fast-paced action.

title: Dragonfiles Only Live for 24 Hours
overview: Two ambitious detectives stakeout a potential drug deal.

title: Ferrum
overview: Due to a violent misunderstanding a young member of a criminal syndicate is torn away from familiar grounds of urban underworld and thrown into unwelcoming wilderness of Siberian taiga. Vast and virtually uninhabited, it provides little distinction between past and present, reality and myth. He must face the ghosts of the past and shadows of the present, and rediscover himself and his destiny, however shattering and unwanted it may be.

title: The Legend
overview: In a nation torn by civil war, two gunslingers must join forces to hunt down the most feared outlaw in Texas.

title: Night Crimes
overview: When a young woman is murdered in Willow Grove, Det. Jack Murdock (Jeff Johnson) and Lt. Joe Gambill (Dan Turpen) and their small police force must race against the clock to locate the true identity of the killer before he strikes again.
tagline: The smallest of towns harbor the darkest of secrets.

title: Southsea Shootout
overview: A deadly game of cat and mouse ensues when a double cross by two hit men sees a business deal go sour and leaves The Target running for his life.
tagline: She wants the money, and she wants him dead!

title: JACKBOYS
overview: The short film shows Travis and his crew of Sheck Wes, Don Toliver and Chase B as outlaws

title: Choke
overview: Forced by an overbearing brotherly figure, young Lewis awaits his enemy. What unfolds will test Lewis and determine the kind of man he is to become.

title: Bostrom
overview: A retired detective gets pulled into a larger conspiracy when he decides to investigate the abduction of a high school student.

title: Password
overview: Revolves around an underworld don, who loses the USB password of his Swiss bank account.

title: The Abused
overview: Documentary exploring the lives of two victims of domestic abuse, Hazel and Kelly, and the events that unfolded as they reported their abuse to the police.

title: Whelm
overview: Set during the Great Depression, two Midwest brothers get tangled in a rivalry between a legendary bank robber and an eccentric young criminal.

title: Xira
overview: Xira is a story about a woman who chose an unconventional path for vengeance. It shows the journey of a mixed-martial arts (MMA) athlete in search of justice for those she loved and lost.

title: Pearl 2
overview: As Travis moves forward in his life, he learns that some things left in the past, don't always stay there.
tagline: Can we separate what is real and what is not?

title: Menantico Blues
overview: Local interviews recall bizarre sightings in South Jersey during the 1970s and more reported decades later, including a gruesome tale from a group of friends deer hunting near the Menantico Ponds in December of 1995.
tagline: Lamb Legs Lives

title: Criminals
overview: When casino heist goes wrong, Dato and Lasha must come up with large sum of money in 24 hours to pay off the crime boss and save their lives.

title: Bridge of Mischiveous Children
overview: Jhony passes the summer with his older brother, who wastes his time along his friends, obsessed with alcohol, pornography and the different women he takes into his mother's bedroom. One day, a girl named Misha arrives at the neighborhood, fracturing their monotony. Nobody knows anything about her, except that they call her Misha because of her green eyes, like those of cats.

title: Rats and Slaves
overview: Nowadays hacking is a well known phenomenon. Almost weekly we see news items about networks that are attacked. The trading of access to ones personal computer and webcam is less widely known, but the results can affect a computer user deeply personal. The simplicity of these hacks and the scale of it are disturbing. Are you already the slave of a RAT, or will you become one very soon?

title: The Fixer
overview: Vic Simmons helps people in desperate situations where the law cannot act. He faces a dire situation when a domineering ex-boyfriend beings stalking and threatening Katie, the younger sister of a deceased friend who he vowed to protect.

title: Carribean Cards
overview: On a cruise ship, two card players take part in a betrayal. Who is the betrayer and who is the betrayed?
tagline: Carribean Cards...

title: JackRabbit 29
overview: Jackrabbit 29 is an unconventional, character-driven thriller by writer & director Kyle Klubal. When a young couple goes missing, a large reward is issued for their return. The reward attracts an eccentric mix of characters to the town including bounty hunters, hit-men, and more. We follow them as they cross paths and search for the missing couple. Full of bizarre characters, a nonlinear story-line, and all sorts of twists and turns...  —Nicholas Matthews
tagline: So many dark deeds committed

title: Azhal
overview: Directed by S Saravanan, the movie is a Singapore-Malaysia collaboration that stars Arvind Naidu, Dato` Shasha Sri, Haydon Roy and more.

title: Atras
overview: The story is about a teenage boy living in the Philippines who is being persuaded by his family to go to the U.S. to live a better life but continues to be caught in a web of bad choices. The plot is close to my heart because it tells the story of so many of my friends and family living there now and the struggles they face with poverty, drugs, and violence.

title: Acai Nakrim
overview: Though the drug does not belong to him, importing heroin gets Acai Nakrim locked up in jail which then leads to his death penalty. Before the execution day, he flees with the help of an old man.

title: You'll Be Next
overview: Oklahoma  cop short with  Lisandro Boccacci, Kevin Romanowski

title: Cara o Sello
overview: Carlos Mendoza is an honest cop. When he doesn't accept a bribe and put in jail the culprits, he awakes the anger of a local drug dealer, who kidnaps its family and makes him choose between his family and his career and partner.

title: Crime de femme : l'affaire Edith Scaravetti
Little Night Murder
overview: A film-noir musical about a serial killer, her loving boyfriend, and the suicidal detective chasing after them.

title: 12 till 12
overview: A man gets the job to get 3 kilo cocaine hidden in a car in a container.

title: Las dos caras de la moneda
overview: The two faces of the coin, ambiented in Madrid, is the story of Lucas an arabian drugdealer, and Francesco a italian poker player, who have completly opposite points of view about life, opposite objectives, opposite mentality and opposite ways, but the  two will meet in the streets of Madrid between prostitutes, drugs, gambling and hoolligans.  ---MADE WITH LESS THAN 1000€---
tagline: The two faces of the coin, español

title: Brutalism
overview: Beneath towering Brutalist architecture, a man is driven to do what must be done.
tagline: Concrete & Steel. Cruelty & Savageness

title: In Layman's Terms
overview: An unexpected event brings together an unlikely group of students.
tagline: You May be Waiting There Sometime

title: Dead Malice
overview: A troubled young cop spends a night alone in his home, unaware of the presence of an unexpected guest.
